"Books Before Beds" - A bookshelf that doubles as a bed for children, allowing them to read and sleep surrounded by their favorite stories.
"Page Turners" - A bookshelf that transforms into a projector, allowing users to display their favorite books on a wall or ceiling.
"The Reading Room" - A bookshelf that doubles as a virtual reality headset, transporting readers to different worlds and environments.
"Books on the Go" - A portable bookshelf that allows users to take their books with them wherever they go.
"The Memory Keeper" - A bookshelf that uses AI to recognize and display personalized book recommendations based on a user's reading history and preferences
